OOC: Just sent it.
 
Hellplague:
 
"What do you mean?!?  I activated the sensor probes and he just shut down?  Nice excuse."
Hellplague knelt over Malice and inspected the unpowered bot.  
"Very strange.  A rare find.  Help me carry him over to the medical lab.  We can use the scanning table there." she said as she picked up Malice's arms and waited for Blacknightmare to grab his legs and carry him into the lab.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
OOC:No yet can you sent it again?

"I didn't nothing"replied the femme

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice/ Hellplague:
>  
> Malice looks up at the femme supposed to be guarding him.
> "How do you stand her?  Is she generally this annoying?" he 
asked.  
> He was trully interested, he wanted a good way to torture her back 
for what ever she had in mind fo him.  
>  
> Hellplague was not too far away.  Far enough to be out of sight, 
close enough to hear the conversation.  She fought the urge o run up 
behind him and pummel him, but she also just wanted to be around 
him.  A strange thought indeed for a Minion.  She pushed hat aside 
and began linking the sensors on Malice's body to a computer panel.  
She intialized the connection and something bizarre happened.  
Malice went rigid, emitted a pained groan, then completely shut 
down.  Hellplague ran in after she was recieving no info on Malice's 
body.
> "What happened?  What did you do to him?" she demanded as she 
tried to awake Malice to no avail.
>  
> OOC: Did you get the email applying my new character yet? 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare::
> 
> "It's your life Hellplague not mine"said sacastically the femme
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Hellplague/ Splattercannon/ Malice:
> >  
> > "Well no one asked you, now did they?" Hellplague said as she 
> stepped in front of Malice and placed some small sensors on 
Malice's 
> face, head and on various locations all over his body.  She turned 
> to Necross and splattercannon and told them to pull him to his 
feet 
> as she lessened the gravity holding him down.  The males obeyed 
and 
> pulled Malice up roughly.  The bounty hunter leaned against 
> Splattercannon as the sudden climbing to his feet made him a 
little 
> light headed.  He stood up straight and tried to look behind him, 
> because he couldn't see that mischevious Hellplague and that was 
> cause for worry.  The Sweep commander shoo-ed away Necross and 
> Splattercannon as she wrapped her arms around Malice's waist.   
The 
> males obeyed with hesitation, while Necross left the room 
entirely, 
> Splattercannon took position by the door.  Malice looked at the 
arms 
> around his waist and looked back at the femme biehind him.  It was 
> at this time he actually noticed, she was kinda pretty.  She looked
> >  like a Generation One Decepticon, only with no insignia.  But 
the 
> though passed out of his mind as quickly as it entered.
> > "'Scuse me, but I fel I must tell you something.  I'm taken.  A 
> little Maxi down there is waiting on me."
> > The Minion did not speak, but walked around in front of Malice, 
> her arms still around his waist.  
> > "Well she's down there, and I'm right here in front of you.  
> Besides, I can offer you more than that Maximal-"
> > "Maxitron actually," the hunter corrected,"it seems she was 
dumped 
> here on accident while dealing with her universe's Unicron." he 
> added with a grin.
> > "Whatever.  It doesn't matter, my pet WILL come around and 
accept 
> me.  Blacknightmare-" Hellplague said as she let go of Malice and 
> shoved him back to the bed,"Make him 'comfortable'." she said with 
a 
> seductive grin.
> > "I need to ready some equipment then we can begin." 
> 
>
